Poor Network Scanner

Python

Poor Network Scanner is a project to learn more about Python networking, sockets, threading. Main goal of this is to recreate some aspects of famous Nmap tool.

View Project


Crypto Tools

Python

After a bit of playing various CTFs, I decided to gather all essential code used to break crypto tasks into one repository. Some of these are forks of other tools - which I reimplemented to make things easier or more efficient, altough keeping information about original authors.
